title: Apple updates iMovie for iOS with 4K video support for iPad Air 2, bug fixes
text:
Apple updates iMovie for iOS with 4K video support for iPad Air 2, bug fixes 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Apple on Thursday released an update to its iMovie video editing app for iOS, bringing 4K support to iPad Air 2 hardware running iOS 9.1 and...
